recipeInstructions.text: This is mixed and kneaded in a Bread Machine for 20 minutes, then allowed to rise for 2 hours. Following the initial rise, it is placed in the refrigerator for 24 hours. The sauce is a fairly simple tomato sauce made from tomato puree and water with salt, pepper, Emeril's Italian Seasoning to taste. I have been using Costco's shredded Mozzarella cheese and Sweet Italian Sausage from the grocery store.
The pizza is baked at 475 in the oven on a pizza screen placed on a pizza stone on the lowest rack of the oven for approximately 12 minutes.
